line.name: ACE
line.text:
Planned Work
[FT]
[E] No trains between Roosevelt Av and World Trade Center
[F] No trains between Roosevelt Av and 21 St-Queensbridge
[M] [R] Service ends early

Late Nights, 10 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Mar 30 - Apr 3 • Apr 6 - 10

[E] service operates between Jamaica Center and Roosevelt Av, making local stops.

[F] service operates in two sections:
1. Between 179 St and Roosevelt Av
2. Between 21 St-Queensbridge and Stillwell Av

[SB] Free shuttle buses operate along two routes:
1. Between Roosevelt Av and Queensboro Plaza, stopping at 65 St, Northern Blvd, 46 St,
Steinway St, 36 St and Queens Plaza
2. Between Queensboro Plaza and 21 St-Queensbridge, stopping at Court Sq


[M] and [R] Customers: Please see separate advisories for travel information.

Planned Work
[A] Inwood-bound trains skip 72, 81, 86, 96, 103, 110 and 116 Sts

Late Night, 10:45 PM Tue to 5 AM Wed, Mar 31 - Apr 1

For service to these stations, take the [A] to 125 St and transfer to a Brooklyn-bound [A].

For service from these stations, take the [A] to 59 St-Columbus Circle and transfer to
an Inwood-bound [A].

Alternate travel note:
Use nearby [1] stations instead via transfer at 59 St-Columbus Circle.

line.name: BDFM
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 03/31/2015 10:01PM

Due to track maintenance at Tremont Av, southbound [D] trains are running express from Bedford Pk Blvd to 167 St.  

Allow additional travel time.



Planned Work
[FT]
[M] Service ends early between Essex St and 71 Av

Evenings, Mon to Thu, Mar 30 - Apr 2 • Apr 6 - 9

[M] service operates between Metropolitan Av and Essex St, and via the [J] to/from Chambers St.

Travel Alternatives[TP]

Take the [R] between Queens Plaza and 71 Av. After [R] service ends, take the [E].
After 10 PM, [E] trains run local between Roosevelt Av and Parsons/Archer only.

[E] trains make all stops between 5 Av/53 St and Queens Plaza.
[F] trains make all stops between Delancey/Essex Sts and 47-50 Sts.

• Transfer between [E] and [F] trains at W 4 St.
• Transfer between [F] and [M] trains at Delancey/Essex Sts.
• Transfer between [F] and [R] trains at 34 St-Herald Sq.

Please use the following guide to arrive at your station prior to end of service.

To 71 Av:  To Metropolitan Av:
Metropolitan Av8:08 PM 71 Av8:13 PM
Myrtle Av8:20 PMRoosevelt Av8:23 PM
Essex St8:33 PMQueens Plaza8:33 PM
W 4 St8:38 PM47-50 Sts8:43 PM
47-50 Sts8:46 PMB'way-Lafayette St8:55 PM

Notes: See [E] [F] advisory for additional information affecting travel in Queens.
Late Night [M] service is not affected.

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

line.name: L
line.text:
Planned Work
[L] No trains between Lorimer St and 8 Av

[A] [F] [J] trains, M14 and [SB] free shuttle buses provide alternate service
Late Nights, 11:30 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, until May 1

[L] service operates between Rockaway Pkwy and Lorimer St.

Travel Alternatives[TP]

In Brooklyn, [SB] buses provide alternate service between Bedford Av and Marcy Av [J],
stopping at Lorimer St [L], Broadway [G] and Hewes St [J].

In Manhattan, additional M14A service operates between 8 Av [A] [E]
and Delancey St/Essex St [F] [J] stations.

For service between Brooklyn and Manhattan, use the [A] or [J].

Station Alternate Service
Lorimer St [SB] on Union Av at Metropolitan Av | [G] [L]
Bedford Av [SB] on Driggs Av at N 7 St
1 Av, 3 AvM14A/D
14 St-Union Sq
[ad] except [4] [6]		M14A/D, [4] [6] [N] [Q]

8 Av/14 St [ad]M14A/D, [A]

Key Transfer Stations

Hewes St[SB] on Broadway at Hooper St

your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

line.name: NQR
line.text:
Planned Work
[FT]
[R] Service ends early between 36 St, Brooklyn and 71 Av, Queens

Late Evenings, Mon to Thu, Mar 30 - Apr 2 • Apr 6 - 9

[R] service operates between 95 St and 36 St in Brooklyn.

Travel Alternatives[TP]

Take the [E] between Queens Plaza and 71 Av until 10 PM.
After 10 PM, [E] trains run local between Roosevelt Av and Parsons/Archer only.

[N] trains make all [R] stops between 59 St, Brooklyn and Lexington Av/59 St.
[D] trains provide alternate service between Brooklyn and Manhattan.

• Transfer between [R] and [D] [N] trains at 36 St.

Please use the following guide to arrive at your station before end of service.

To 71 Av:  To 95 St:
95 St9:03 PM 71 Av9:12 PM
DeKalb Av9:27 PMLexington Av/59 St9:39 PM
Canal St9:41 PMCanal St9:56 PM
Times Sq-42 St9:51 PMWhitehall St10:03 PM

Notes: See [E] [F] advisory for additional information affecting travel in Queens.
Late Night [R] service is not affected.

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

line.name: B1 - B84
line.text:
Planned Detour
B38/B38 LTD - Eastbound buses rerouted from Lafayette Av between
Stuyvesant Av and Malcolm X Blvd

Until further notice

Due to construction, buses make corresponding stops along the detoured route.

Show Reroute Details
Via Lafayette Av
Right on Stuyvesant Av
Left on Greene Av
Left on Malcolm X Blvd
Right on Lafayette Av then regular route


Reminder: B38 LTD buses do not operate overnight.




Planned Detour
B24 and B46/B46 LTD buses detoured from the Entrance on Broadway at Washington Plz Terminal

Until further notice

Due to construction, buses operate as follows:

Via Broadway
Right on Roebling St into Washington Plaza.




Planned Detour
B20 and Q24 - Northbound/Westbound buses detoured from Van Sinderen Av at Broadway
Junction due to construction - No stops missed

Until further notice

Show Reroute Details
Via Jamaica Av
Into Fulton St
Right on Eastern Pkwy
Left on Broadway then regular route


Reminder: B20 buses do not operate overnight.

line.name: BX1 - BX55
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 03/31/2015 10:02PM

Bx7 buses are detoured in both directions due to NYPD activity on 204 St and Broadway.

Detour is as follows:

Southbound: Via Broadway, left on 207 St, right on Sherman Av, right on Dyckman St, left on Broadway to regular route.

Northbound: Via Broadway, right on Dyckman St, left on Sherman Av, left on 207 St, right on Broadway to regular route.

All corresponding stops will be made along detoured route.

Allow additional travel time.



Service Change  Posted: 03/31/2015 10:01PM

Bx11 buses are detoured due to road work on West Farms Rd between Jennings St and E 172 St.

Detour is as follows:

Westbound: Via West Farms Rd, left on Jennings St, right on Longfellow Av, left on E 172 St and regular route.

Allow additional travel time.

line.name: M1 - M116
line.text:
Delays  Posted: 03/31/2015 10:01PM

M1, M2, M3, M4 and Q32 buses are running with delays southbound, due to heavy traffic on 5 Av from 43 St to 88 St.

Allow additional travel time.



Service Change  Posted: 03/31/2015 10:01PM

M100 buses are detoured, due to construction on E 125 St and 1 Av.

Detour is as follows:

Eastbound: Via 125 St, left on 3 Av, right on E 127 St, right on 2 Av, stand at near side of E 126 St.

Allow additional travel time. 



Planned Detour
M8 - Eastbound buses rerouted from 2 Av at 8 St (St Marks Pl)

Until further notice

Due to FDNY activity, buses make corresponding stops along the detoured route.

Show Reroute Details
Eastbound
Via St Marks Pl
Left on 3 Av
Right on 14 St
Right on Avenue A
Left on 10 St then regular route


Reminder: M8 buses do not operate overnight.




Planned Detour
M2/M2 LTD, M3 and M21 buses may experience delays due to street closure on 2 Av
between 14 St and E Houston St

Until further notice

• Please allow additional travel time.

Reminder: M2 LTD, M3 and M21 buses do not operate overnight.





Planned Detour
M15 - Southbound buses bypass the stops on 2 Av at 8 St and 6 St

Until further notice

Due to FDNY activity, please use nearby stops along 2 Av instead.




Planned Detour
M15/M15 SBS - Northbound bus stop on 1 Av at 28 St temporarily closed

Until Summer 2015

Due to construction, please use nearby stops:

M15: 1 Av at 25 St.
M15 SBS: 1 Av at 24 St.

Reminder: M15 SBS buses do not operate overnight.




Planned Detour
M15 - Northbound bus stop on 1 Av between E 86 St and E 87 St temporarily relocated

Until further notice

Due to construction, please use the temporary stop on 1 Av at E 87 St.




Planned Detour
M1/M1 LTD, M5/M5 LTD M14A/M14D and M103 buses may experience delays
due to street closure on 2 Av between 14 St and E Houston St

Until further notice

• Please allow additional travel time.

Reminder: M1 LTD, M5 LTD buses do not operate overnight or weekends.

line.name: Verrazano-Narrows
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 03/31/2015  9:31PM

Verrazano Narrows Bridge has 2 lanes closed upper level Eastbound (Brooklyn bound).

Service Change  Posted: 03/16/2015  6:24AM

VNB - UPPER LEVEL TRAFFIC PATTERN

 

Monday thru Thursday: 5 AM to 9:30 AM (3) Lanes Brooklyn-bound. (2) Lanes Staten Island-bound.

2:30 PM to 10PM (3) Lanes Staten Island-bound. (2) Lanes Brooklyn-bound.

 

 Friday: 5 AM to 9:30 AM (3) Lanes Bklyn-bnd. (2) Lanes Staten Island-bound.

1:30 PM to 11:59 PM (3) Lanes Staten Island-bound. (2) Lanes Brooklyn-bound.

 

 Saturday and Sunday:

 Three (3) Lanes Staten Island-bound. Two (2) Lanes Brooklyn-bound.

line.name: Ronkonkoma
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 03/31/2015  9:43PM

LIRR Morning Rush Service Advisory for Wednesday, April 1

Ronkonkoma Branch customers should anticipate 15-25 minute delays during Wednesday morning's rush hour, April 1, due to damage to the LIRR's signal system from Monday's freight car derailment in Wyandanch. Until the signal system is fully repaired and tested, LIRR trains must continue to operate at reduced speed between Farmingdale and Wyandanch. 

On Wednesday morning, two eastbound Ronkonkoma Branch trains will be partially canceled and bus service provided. They are:
  • The 5:11 AM train from Penn Station to Ronkonkoma will be terminated at Farmingdale. Customers for stations Wyandanch through Ronkonkoma must detrain at Hicksville for buses for the remainder of their trip.  Bethpage and Farmingdale customers will have regular train service.
  • The 7:54 AM train from Deer Park to Riverhead will instead originate from Ronkonkoma at 8:10 AM. Customers at stations Deer Park, Brentwood and Central Islip will receive bus service to Riverhead.

LIRR crews are continuing to work around-the-clock to repair and test the LIRR's signal system damaged by the derailment.
